rules.title: Josi Pilates Studio Rules
rules.subtitle: Please read and follow these important guidelines
rules.classDurationDesc: Information about class length and structure
rules.classDurationText: Classes have a duration of 55 minutes
rules.arrivalPolicyDesc: When to arrive for your classes
rules.arrivalPolicyText: Arrive at least 5 minutes before class starts
rules.arrivalPolicyDetail: We kindly ask that you arrive at least 5 minutes before the start of your class. This extra time allows for a smooth setup in the studio and ensures you can begin your session comfortably.
rules.cancellationPolicyDesc: Important information about canceling or rescheduling classes
rules.cancellationPolicyDetail: If you need to cancel or reschedule your session, please make sure to inform us at least 24 hours in advance.
rules.cancellationWarning: Failure to comply with this policy will result in the loss of the class.
rules.additionalGuidelinesDesc: Other important information for a great experience
rules.wearComfortableClothingDesc: Please wear appropriate athletic wear that allows for movement.
rules.stayHydratedDesc: Remember to drink water before and after your class.
rules.respectSpaceDesc: Please be mindful of other students and maintain a positive environment.
rules.contactIntro: If you have any questions about these rules or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us:

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Josi Pilates Studio. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose and protect your information when you use our application and services.

thirdParty.title: 2.3 Information from Third Parties
items: Data from Google when you sign in with your Google account

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide and manage your pilates services

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following circumstances:
items: To protect our rights and safety

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your app experience. You can control cookie usage through your browser settings.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you about significant changes through the app or by email.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Josi Pilates Studio app, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the app.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Josi Pilates Studio provides a platform for scheduling, managing and tracking pilates classes. Our services include:
items: Scheduling of individual and group classes

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old or have parental/guardian consent. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information.

userAccounts.title: 4. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

purchases.title: 5.1 Credit Purchases
purchases.content: Class credits can be purchased through the app. All payments are processed securely and are final, except as stated in our refund policy.

cancellation.title: 5.2 Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Classes can be canceled or rescheduled with at least 24 hours notice. Late cancellations or unjustified absences will result in loss of the class credit.

refunds.title: 5.3 Refunds
refunds.content: Unused credits can be refunded upon written request, subject to administrative fees.

studioRules.title: 6. Studio Rules
studioRules.content: By participating in classes, you agree to follow all studio rules and guidelines, including but not limited to:
items: Arrive at least 5 minutes before class starts

userConduct.title: 7. User Conduct
items: Use the app for any illegal purpose
Attempt to access unauthorized system areas

intellectualProperty.content: All app content, including text, graphics, logos and software, is owned by Josi Pilates Studio or its licensors and is protected by copyright laws.

liabilityLimitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liabilityLimitation.content: Josi Pilates Studio is not liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from app use. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

warrantyDisclaimer.title: 10. Warranty Disclaimer
warrantyDisclaimer.content: The app is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not warrant that the app will always be available or error-free.

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold Josi Pilates Studio harmless from any claim, loss or damage arising from misuse of the app.

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to the app at any time, without notice, for violation of these terms.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Quebec, Canada. Any dispute will be resolved in the competent courts of Montreal.

termsChanges.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continuing to use the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
